pull.title: [wallet] Remove -usehd
pull.body: `-usehd` is no longer used (except to tell the user that they've set it incorrectly for the wallet that they're loading). Remove it (in the same spirit as #14272)

verification.payload:

author John Newbery <john@johnnewbery.com> 1537476068 -0400
committer John Newbery <john@johnnewbery.com> 1537478774 -0400

[wallet] Remove -usehd

events.body: <!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->No more conflicts as of last run.

This will throw even if it is set correctly, e.g. it will throw for a non-hd wallet to set -nousehd.

utACK 25548b295861c19ad0c25319df727216f81f21a8

This will force users to remove `-usehd` from configs. Add release note?

BTW Tested ACK 25548b2.

events.body:
> Add release note?

Done.

I think the code change is ready for merge. It has 5 ACKs.
